entry.def: A championship is a competition to find the best player or team in a particular sport.

entry.tran: 冠军头衔;冠军称号;第一名
entry.def: The championship refers to the title or status of being a sports champion.

example.ex: He went on to take the championship...
This season I expect us to retain the championship and win the European Cup.
example.tran: 这个赛季我期待我们能够保住冠军头衔，赢得欧洲杯。

means.word_mean: 1. the status of being a champion;

means.word_mean: 2. the act of providing approval and support;

sentences.sentence: "his vigorous backing of the conservatives got him in trouble with progressives"

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 名词,表示"某种技能"; 2. 表名词,表示"某种关系,状态"

stems_affixes.word_buile: airman飞行员,空军+ship某种技能→n.飞行术,导航技术
horseman养马的人,骑师,马兵+ship某种技能→n.马术

stems_affixes.value_cn: 推销术,说服力,销售,推销
stems_affixes.word_buile: salsman推销员+ship某种技能→n.推销术,说服力,销售,推销
champion冠军+ship某种关系,状态→n.锦标赛;冠军赛

stems_affixes.value_cn: 市民权,公民权,国民的义务[身份]
stems_affixes.word_buile: citizen公民+ship某种关系,状态→n.市民权,公民权,国民的义务[身份]
dictator专政者+ship某种关系,状态→n.独裁[权];专政
friend朋友+ship某种关系,状态→n.友谊,友好
hard艰难的+ship某种关系,状态→n.艰难,困苦
member成员+ship某种关系,状态→n.会员资格,成员资格
partner合作者+ship某种关系,状态→n.合伙企业
relation关系,联系+ship某种关系,状态→n.关系,联系
